meanings.definition: A large, impressive building or residence.
meanings.sent1: The old palazzos in the city were admired by all for their grandeur.
meanings.sent2: We visited a beautiful palazzos in Italy during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The palazzos looked like they were straight out of a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The palazzos stood tall like giants in the historic district.
meanings.sent5: The palazzos were so magnificent that they left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.definition: Loose, wide-legged trousers worn by women.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pair of comfortable palazzos to the beach.
meanings.sent2: Palazzos are perfect for a casual day out with friends.
meanings.sent3: Her palazzos fluttered in the wind as she walked along the shore.
meanings.sent4: The palazzos flowed elegantly as she danced at the party.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of her palazzos brightened up the room.
